channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

Government shutdown live updates as stalemate continues into second week
item.description: The 2025 government shutdown entered its sixth day on Monday with no signs of an imminent resolution. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Government shutdown updates: Hassett says shutdown will cost US GDP about $15B a week
item.description: White House economic advisor Kevin Hassett told CNBC on Monday morning that the government shutdown will cost the U.S. GDP about $15 billion per week.

item.title: Trump orders National Guard troops to Chicago

item.title: Hurricane Priscilla intensifying off southwest Mexico. Maps show forecast path.
item.description: Priscilla strengthened into a hurricane Sunday and was getting stronger early Monday, forecasters said.

item.title: ICE ad blitz aims to lure local law enforcement officers to join Trump mass deportation efforts

item.title: WATCH: Melania Trump greets sailors with 'hooyah' at Navy 250 event
item.description: First lady Melania Trump greeted sailors with a "hooyah" as she spoke at an event celebrating the U.S. Navy's 250th anniversary in Norfolk, Virginia.
